name: yourtv  pruned
description: Extraneous banner and footer promotional material pruned from just the TV guide pages at this domain. Other pages retain the prescribed banners and footers.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document 
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/yesterday/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/tomorrow/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/Mon/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/Tue/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/wed/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/Thu/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/Fri/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/Sat/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/Sun/"),

url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/yesterday/fullday/"),

url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/yesterday/morning/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/yesterday/afternoon/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/yesterday/night/"),

url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/nownext/"),

url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/tonight/"),

url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/tomorrow/fullday/"),

url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/tomorrow/morning/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/tomorrow/afternoon/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/tomorrow/night/"),

url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/mon/fullday/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/mon/early/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/mon/morning/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/mon/afternoon/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/mon/night/"),

url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/tue/fullday/"),

url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/wed/fullday/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/wed/early/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/wed/morning/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/wed/afternoon/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/wed/night/"),

url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/thu/fullday/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/thu/early/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/thu/morning/"),
url("http://www.yourtv.com.au/guide/thu/afternoon/"),

.FIXBOTTOM,
#nw_ft_wrap,
#grid #pay-region-add,
#grid h1,
#cat_hl_221908,
div#hd_1                { display:none; }

html body               { background-color: #ffffff !important; }

#tvfix_site_nav_wrapper { background-color:#61FF61; }

}
